Package gg.w6.chesslib.model

package gg.w6.chesslib.model
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    gg.w6.chesslib.model.piece
     
  • Class
    Description
    CastlingRights
    Represents the castling rights of both players in a chess game.
    Color
    Represents the color of a chess piece.
    Coordinate
    Represents a coordinate on a chessboard.
    File
    Represents the files on a chessboard.
    Game
    A record representing a game of chess.
    Move
    This class encapsulates the details of a move on a chessboard, including the origin and destination squares, the type of move (such as normal, castling, en passant, or promotion), and the piece to promote to (if applicable).
    MoveType
    Represents the various types of moves in a position
    Offset
    Represents an offset on a chessboard.
    Position
    Represents a chess position, including the arrangement of pieces on the board, castling rights, active color, en passant target square, halfmove clock, and fullmove number.
    PromotionCandidate
    Any classes with this annotation are put on the list of possible promotion pieces.
    Rank
    Represents the ranks on a chessboard.
    Square
    Represents a single square on a standard 8x8 chessboard.
